_comment: Skill metadata for the Skill page. Each key matches a skillset ID used in portfolio items.

tooldev.title: Tool Development
tooldev.description: Production tools should treat artists as first-class users. With 15+ years across Unreal, Unity, and Houdini, I design schema-driven editors and async job systems that hide complexity while ensuring production-scale reliability.

pipelinedev.title: Pipeline Development
pipelinedev.description: Automation backbone for multi-studio environments, processing tens of thousands of assets. I build modular, inspectable ingestion layers that connect legacy data, mocap, and AI-generated content into unified game-ready pipelines.

unrealdev.title: Unreal Engine Development
unrealdev.description: Native C++ plugins, procedural city systems, and runtime interaction frameworks—extending Unreal Engine at the core level. My focus is delivering stable, performant environments that hold up under real production conditions, not just editor previews.

unitydev.title: Unity Development
unitydev.description: Technical friction slows artists down. In Unity, I build custom C# curve editors, lighting dashboards, and attribute-driven VFX components that replace brittle manual workflows with safe, iterative inspector-based authoring.

procgen.title: Procedural Generation
procgen.description: Procedural systems should encode designer intent, not random distribution. Using Houdini and Unreal PCG, I build validation-ready pipelines that transform sparse inputs—splines, zoning maps—into massive, destructible, performant worlds.

vfx.title: VFX & Interactive Systems
vfx.description: VFX that respond to the world in real time—Niagara fluids driven by gesture tracking, procedural geometry reacting to gameplay. Bridging art and code to deliver expressive visuals that remain stable and performant at runtime.

artinstallation.title: Art Installations
artinstallation.description: Public-facing installations demand 24/7 stability with unpredictable audiences. I deploy fault-tolerant Unreal experiences integrating computer vision and nDisplay multi-projection, built for continuous operation in live environments.
